subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: With a loss to Atalanta, Inter Milan has allowed Juventus to come within three points of the league lead, setting up a pivotal match in Turin on April 19 if both teams stay on course.
snippet: With a loss to Atalanta, Inter Milan has allowed Juventus to come within three points of the league lead, setting up a pivotal match in Turin on April 19 if both teams stay on course.
